landing.title: Fullstack developer based in La Pampa, Argentina
landing.abstract: Passionate about software development. The self taught path helped me reconnect with systems in a different way. My prior fomation in communication, audiovisuals and carpentry shapes my versatile profile in this new pursuit.
landing.torre: This is the very first I built. It's a madlibs. It takes a series of words and fills up a randomly picked micro story from a handpicked list. It's a really simple and fun game. At the moment all the stories are in spanish.
landing.agur: This is an Ecommerce site for a real brand I work in as a community manager/photographer. It's a WiP and my first approach to web-dev. As my first React project it started as 100% React and I gradually added different frameworks. Also through this project I taught myself some NoSQL DB and integrated a very simple DB with MongoDB
landing.goTorre: Go to the Tower of Mabel

cv.title: Fullstack Developer
cv.aptitudes: I’m well acquainted with JavaSript and frameworks like React, NextJS and various UI frameworks as well. I also know my way around web api services, RESTful architecture and the importance of Clean Code. I’m a native Spanish speaker but since I finished High School in New Zealand I can fluently communicate in English. Through a vast experience in different fields I built versatility and adaptability. At the moment I’m totally invested in software development. I thrive in creative problem solving and I’m always looking forward to furthering my knowledge.
